products.title: Classic White T-Shirt
products.description: Essential crew neck t-shirt in pure white. Made from premium cotton for all-day comfort. Perfect for casual wear or layering.

products.title: Navy Blue Denim Jeans
products.description: Classic slim-fit jeans in dark indigo wash. Comfortable stretch denim with modern cut. Perfect for everyday wear.

products.title: Black Casual Chinos
products.description: Versatile black chino pants with slim fit. Soft cotton blend fabric perfect for smart-casual occasions.

products.title: Grey Crew Neck Sweatshirt
products.description: Comfortable fleece sweatshirt in heather grey. Relaxed fit with ribbed cuffs and hem. Perfect for casual days.

products.title: Beige Cargo Shorts
products.description: Practical cargo shorts with multiple pockets. Lightweight cotton perfect for summer and beach activities.

products.title: Blue Denim Jacket
products.description: Classic trucker-style denim jacket in medium blue wash. Timeless design with button front and chest pockets.

products.title: Khaki Chino Pants
products.description: Smart-casual khaki chinos with modern slim fit. Versatile pants perfect for office or weekend wear.

products.title: Black Leather Jacket
products.description: Premium faux leather moto jacket in classic black. Edgy style with asymmetric zipper and multiple pockets.

products.title: Light Blue Jeans
products.description: Relaxed fit jeans in light wash denim. Comfortable and casual with classic 5-pocket styling.

products.title: Striped Cotton T-Shirt
products.description: Classic striped tee in navy and white. Soft cotton jersey with comfortable regular fit.

products.title: Black Joggers
products.description: Comfortable athletic joggers in black. Elastic waistband with drawstring and tapered legs with cuffs.

products.title: White Button-Down Shirt
products.description: Crisp white oxford shirt perfect for formal or smart-casual looks. Classic fit with button-down collar.

products.title: Olive Green Cargo Pants
products.description: Utility-style cargo pants in olive green. Multiple pockets and durable fabric for outdoor activities.

products.title: Beach Print Hawaiian Shirt
products.description: Vibrant tropical print shirt perfect for beach parties and summer events. Lightweight and breathable fabric.

products.title: Navy Blue Swim Shorts
products.description: Quick-dry swim shorts in navy blue. Elastic waistband with mesh lining, perfect for beach and pool.

products.title: Burgundy Hoodie
products.description: Cozy pullover hoodie in rich burgundy color. Soft fleece interior with kangaroo pocket and drawstring hood.

products.title: Grey Dress Pants
products.description: Formal dress pants in charcoal grey. Tailored fit with pressed creases, perfect for business attire.

products.title: Red Plaid Flannel Shirt
products.description: Classic red and black plaid flannel shirt. Soft brushed cotton perfect for layering in cooler weather.

products.title: Black Athletic Shorts
products.description: Performance athletic shorts with moisture-wicking fabric. Perfect for gym workouts and running.

products.title: Cream Knit Sweater
products.description: Chunky knit sweater in warm cream color. Cozy cable-knit design perfect for winter layering.
